Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running with delays due to to a shortage of available staff; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier shortage of available staff. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Southbound #4 Cottage Grove Reroute near Cottage Grove/94th
ShortDescription: Southbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are rerouted via Cottage Grove, 87th, King Drive, 95th and Cottage Grove due to police activity near Cottage Grove/94th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are rerouted via Cottage Grove, 87th, King Drive, 95th and Cottage Grove due to police activity near Cottage Grove/94th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Eastbound #95 95th and #N5 South Shore Night  Reroute near Cottage Grove/94th
ShortDescription: Eastbound 95 95th & N5 South Shore Night buses are rrtd via 95th, King Drive, 87th, Cottage Grv, & 93rd due to police activity nr Cottage Grove/94th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #95 95th and #N5 South Shore Night buses are rerouted via 95th, King Drive, 87th, Cottage Grove, 93rd & will continue over its regular route due to police activity near Cottage Grove/94th.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with delays due to to a shortage of available staff; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with delays due to a temporary shortage of available staff.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
